body:
i forgot to roast the rest of the chicken thighs last night, but we had a container of ravioli in the fridge and so had that instead

i have leftover ravioli to have for lunch today 

miso's pavlovian response to the click of me opening a can opener

that my work trip to dublin next week got totally cancelled (after being partially cancelled last week), even though that sucks because despite everything i still wanted to go and meet the people who were still also going to go, but thankful that at least to not be in limbo about it anymore

wrote some code to help my team simplify some tedious manual work

the feeling when you finally get all the details right and hold your breath and turn it on and the machine just works

knowing that what i was building was _really_ just something to use temporarily to bridge two systems (rather than the pressure of it being something that needs to last)

making my friends laugh in our group chat

i have leftover ravioli to have for lunch today 

miso's pavlovian response to the click of me opening a can opener

that my work trip to dublin next week got totally cancelled (after being partially cancelled last week), even though that sucks because despite everything i still wanted to go and meet the people who were still also going to go, but thankful that at least to not be in limbo about it anymore

wrote some code to help my team simplify some tedious manual work

the feeling when you finally get all the details right and hold your breath and turn it on and the machine just works

knowing that what i was building was _really_ just something to use temporarily to bridge two systems (rather than the pressure of it being something that needs to last)

making my friends laugh in our group chat
